availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Scottsville, Kentucky, resident. Tennessee native. Married to John C. Wray. Resident in Scottsville in 1860.

Allen County, Kentucky, resident. Tennessee native. Married to John C. Wray. Mother of Martha A. Wray, Mary E. Wray, James M. Wray, Margaret E. Wray, Minerva J. Wray, Robert T. Wray, Susan R. Wray, John B. Wray, and Sarah E. Wray. Resident of Clinton County, Kentucky, in 1850. Resident of Allen County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clinton County, District 1, p. 167A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Allen, Scottsville, p. 346.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Wolfe County, Precinct 3, p. 428B.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994032, Clinton County Births.
"Sabrina Gaines Wray (1825-1904)," Find A Grave, Memorial 105585311, accessed August 21, 2023, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/105585311.
